pkgmetadata.longdescription: # OVOS GUI MessageBusGUI messagebus service, manages GUI state and implements the [gui protocol](./protocol.md)GUI clients (the application that actually draws the GUI) connect to this service# Configurationunder mycroft.conf```javascript{ "gui": { // Override: SYSTEM (set by specific enclosures) // Uncomment or add "idle_display_skill" to set initial homescreen // "idle_display_skill": "skill-ovos-homescreen.openvoiceos", // Extensions provide additional GUI platform support for specific devices // Currently supported devices: smartspeaker, bigscreen or generic "extension": "generic", // Generic extension can additionaly provide homescreen functionality // homescreen support is disabled by default for generic extension "generic": { "homescreen_supported": false } // Optional file server support for remote clients // "gui_file_server": true, // "file_server_port": 8000, // Optionally specify a default qt version for connected clients // "default_qt_version": 5, }, // The GUI messagebus websocket. Once port is created per connected GUI "gui_websocket": { "host": "0.0.0.0", "base_port": 18181, "route": "/gui", "ssl": false }}```
